resources.string:
A Fun Way to Improve your vocabulary! There are three levels of difficulty
1. Easy - 59s 2. Medium - 35s 3. Hard - 20s
Try unraveling as many words and you can. Try finding out their meanings.Improve your pattern recognition and Vocabulary skills.
This is Version 1.0. Look out for newer versions with more engaging features.
Are you sure you want to quit?
Your time is up. Do you want to continue or quit?
